title: server cores
extract: Server Core is a minimal server installation option for the Windows Server 2008 R2 operating system. Server Core provides a low-maintenance environment capable of providing core server roles. Server Core is designed to provide an environment that reduces: Servicing requirements.
extract_html: Server Core is a minimal server installation option for the Windows Server 2008 R2 operating system. Server Core provides a low-maintenance environment capable of providing core server roles. Server Core is designed to provide an environment that reduces: Servicing requirements.
